options_premium_upgrade_description.message: Customize and enhance your adblocking experience! <a0>Learn more</a0>

options_aa_opt_out_survey.message: To help us improve Adblock Plus, mind sharing why you’ve turned off Acceptable Ads?

options_tab_advanced.description: Sidebar tab label and main heading inside corresponding tab

options_general_description.message: Determine what Adblock Plus shows and hides on websites

options_recommended_annoyances_descripti.message: Block floating videos, newsletter pop-ups, survey requests and site notifications.

options_recommended_cookies_premium_desc.message: Browse websites without having to see cookie notifications.

options_recommended_privacy_description.message: Protect your privacy from known entities that may track your online activity across websites you visit.

options_recommended_social_description.message: Prevent social media networks from building a profile of you based on your browsing habits.

options_recommended_notifications_descri.message: Stop websites from asking you to allow push notifications that could track your online activity.

options_acceptableAds_description.message: Acceptable ads are non-annoying ads that comply with a strict ad standard. They help generate revenue for content creators and do not interfere with the content you are viewing.

options_tracking_warning_1.message: We noticed you have both $tracking$ and $acceptableAds$ enabled.

options_tracking_warning_2.message: We want you to know that in order for advertisers to show you more relevant ads, there may be some tracking with acceptable ads.

options_tracking_warning_3.message: If you prefer extra privacy, select the $acceptableAdsPrivacy$ checkbox below.

acceptableAdsPrivacy.example: Only allow ads without third-party tracking

options_tracking_warning_acknowledgment.description: Text in the tracking notification (being shown when both 'Acceptable Ads' and 'EasyPrivacy' are enabled) in General tab

options_acceptableAds_ads_description_1.message: Acceptable ads do not interfere with the content you are viewing. Learn more

options_acceptableAds_privacy_label.description: Acceptable Ads section option label in General tab
options_acceptableAds_privacy_label.message: Only allow ads without third-party tracking

options_acceptableAds_dnt_notification.description: Acceptable Ads section's notification (being shown if Do Not Track is not enabled) in General tab
options_acceptableAds_dnt_notification.message: Note: You have Do Not Track (DNT) disabled in your browser settings. For this feature to work properly, please enable DNT in your browser preferences. Find out how to enable DNT.

options_language_description.message: Add or remove languages that you want Adblock Plus to block ads in. <a0>Learn more</a0>

options_language_empty.description: Language section language list empty text in General tab
options_language_empty.message: You don't have any language-specific filters.

options_language_change.description: Language section language list single entry text in General tab

options_language_tip.description: Language section tip in General tab
options_language_tip.message: TIP: Only select the languages you need. Selecting more will slow down the ad blocker and, therefore, your browsing speed.

options_language_join.description: Combines language filter list specifications(language names) together, ex: -> https://gitlab.com/eyeo/specs/spec/blob/5a876713adebe79842be51ad6e287b1c675e023a/spec/abp/desktop-settings.md#language-drop-down

options_language_recommend.message: Notify me of available language filter lists

options_language_recommend_tooltip.message: Adblock Plus relies on filter lists to block ads in different languages.

options_more_filters_description.description: More filters section description in General tab
options_more_filters_description.message: These are additional filters you previously added to Adblock Plus.

options_more_filters_note.description: More filters section note in General tab
options_more_filters_note.message: Note: You should only use third party filter lists from authors that you trust.

options_english.description: Language section text inside 'Language' table and 'Select language' dialog in General tab

options_allowlist_description.message: You've turned off ad blocking on these websites and, therefore, will see ads on them.

options_allowlist_empty_1.message: You don't have any websites in your allowlist.

options_allowlist_empty_2.message: Websites you trust and want to allow ads on will be shown here.

options_advanced_description.message: Customize Adblock Plus, add or remove filter lists, create and maintain your own filter lists

options_customize_blockElement.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_blockElement_tooltip.description: Tooltip text for Show 'Block element' option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_blockElement_tooltip.message: Temporarily block annoying items on a webpage, e.g. images or animated slideshows.

options_customize_elemhideDebug.message: Turn on debug element hiding filters mode

options_customize_elemhideDebug_tooltip.message: Highlight elements on a page that are affected by element hiding filters.

options_customize_iconStats.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_iconStats.message: Show number of ads blocked in icon

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.message: Show 'Adblock Plus' panel in developer tools

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel_tool.message: View blocked and allowlisted items from your browser's developer tools panel.

options_customize_showNotifications.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_showNotifications_tool.description: Tooltip text for Show notifications option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showNotifications_tool.message: Allow notifications from Adblock Plus (notifications related to critical performance issues will always be shown).

options_filterList_description.description: Filter lists section description in Advanced tab
options_filterList_description.message: Each Adblock Plus setting functions because of a filter list. Below are the filter lists that correspond to all of your Adblock Plus settings. You can also add additional filters created and maintained by our trusted community.

options_filterList_column_status.description: Column name of filter list table in Advanced tab

options_filterList_column_name.description: Column name of filter list table in Advanced tab

options_filterList_column_update.description: Column name of filter list table in Advanced tab

options_filterList_empty.description: Empty text of filter list table in Advanced tab
options_filterList_empty.message: You have not added any filter lists to Adblock Plus. Filter lists you add will be shown here.

options_filterList_now.description: Text inside 'Last update' column in Advanced tab

options_filterList_minutes.description: Text inside 'Last update' column in Advanced tab

options_filterList_hours.description: Text inside 'Last update' column in Advanced tab

options_customFilters_description.description: Custom filter lists section description in Advanced tab
options_customFilters_description.message: Create and maintain your own filters to further control what content Adblock Plus allows or blocks. <a0>Learn how to write filters (English only)</a0>

options_customFilters_widget_title.description: Custom filter widget title in Advanced tab

options_filterList_errorPopup_title.message: There are one or more issues with this filter list:

options_filterList_lastDownload_invalidU.message: Not a valid address. Check the URL.
Download failed. URL must start with $protocol$.

options_filterList_lastDownload_connecti.message: Filter list has failed to download.

options_filterList_filtersDisabled.message: Some filters in this filter list are disabled.

options_filterList_updateNow.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_filterList_website.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_filterList_source.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_customFilter_cancel.description: Label below raw view of user's filter list in Advanced tab

options_help_description.message: Find help or get in touch with us

options_help_center.message: Looking for answers to your questions? <a0>Visit our Help Center (English only)</a0>

options_report_bug.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_bug.message: Found a bug? Send us a bug report

options_report_forum.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_forum.message: Want support from our community? Go to the Forum

options_social_description.description: 'Get in touch' section description in Help tab
options_social_description.message: Have a question or a new idea? We're here to help.

options_dialog_about_version.description: Version information in 'about Adblock Plus' modal dialog

options_dialog_about_copyright.description: Copyright information in 'about Adblock Plus' modal dialog

options_dialog_about_trademark.description: Trademark information in 'about Adblock Plus' modal dialog
options_dialog_about_trademark.message: All rights reserved. Adblock Plus® is a registered trademark of eyeo GmbH.

options_dialog_invalid_message.message: For security reasons, only HTTPS filter lists and data URLs can be added.

options_dialog_predefined_title.description: Dialog title for adding a predefined subscription
options_dialog_predefined_title.message: Are you sure you want to add this filter list?

options_dialog_import_title.description: Title of 'Add a filter list' dialog

options_dialog_import_subscription_locat.description: Input label in 'Add a filter list' dialog
Error message of 'Filter list URL' input in 'Add a filter list' dialog

options_dialog_language_other_empty.description: Text shown when list of available languages is empty

options_dialog_optIn_premium_subscriptio.message: Turn on block cookie consent pop-ups
By adding this feature and blocking these prompts, you are consenting to not be notified about cookie usage and to edit cookie settings on individual websites. You can change this at any time.

options_generic_error.message: Uh oh! Something went wrong. Please try again.

options_allowlist_notification.message: Website has been added to the allowlist.

options_supportUs_description.message: Please take a moment to rate ABP or donate to the project. Thanks for your support!

options_data_collection_opt_out_descript.message: In order to provide the best possible user experience, the Adblock Plus extension collects some user data by default. You can choose to opt-out of data collection here.

options_data_collection_opt_out_label.message: Opt-out of all data collection in the Adblock Plus extension.
